author: cbegin
msg: Implemented lazy initialization of connections. Affects Delegate, SessionImpl, all Statements, and SessionScope (added UserProvidedTransaction)

author: cbegin
msg: Removed string+concatenation+that could cause performance issues (setData() is called many times in a single request).

author: cbegin
msg: Added param count to CacheKey equals, removed redundant bit shift

author: bgoodin
msg: Added ErrorContext moreInfo setting into JavaBeanDataExchange

author: cbegin
msg: MAJOR Refactoring of concurrent access to cache models.  It is now locked based on the combination of CacheController and CacheKey without actually locking either.  Cache controllers can now be accessed concurrently, but not with the same key at the same time.
